attributes.action: STOP THE CAR INSURANCE RIP OFF NOW!!
attributes.additional_details:
1) the whole industry needs to be sorted out,they are just ripping us off.and making millions
2) car insurance is legalized robbery.
3) give the young drivers the chance to get a good deal on insurance ,before hitting them with unafordable policy prices.
4)ever been to an insurance head office,go to one and wait till you see all the top of the range cars in the car park,we are paying for them.
5)ever tried making a claim,BEST OF LUCK.
6) AFTER MAKING A CLAIM beware of next years policy even if youve protected your no claims bonus IT WILL GO UP..

rejection.details: The petitioner may also wish to consider the existing petitions on this topic before deciding whether to submit a revised petition.
